channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Lights not working most nights outside 31 and 30, 1st May
item.description:
Light outside 31 Redmarley Road comes on for 5 minutes then goes off for the rest of the night. Earlier this one was on and the 2 either side were off. At the time of making this report the one outside 31 was is off but the 2 either side are on. There is one outside 30 that is also off most nights. This has only happened since the clocks changed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Redmarley Road, Oakley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo bin overflowing, 1st May
item.description:
Bin not been emptied in weeks. Now overflowing and dog poo now all over pavement
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bulford Close, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping on back street between Hungerford St & Albert St, 1st May
item.description:
Various Flytipped items in the lane between Hungerford St & Albert St, Larput Place end. Items include long metal chimney pipe, mattress and bags & tubs of builders materials including sharp sand and paint

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Larput Place, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandon roadworks on pavement, 1st May
item.description:
Gloucester Road (B4633) - on pavement by St Marks Methodist Chapel. Area is barricaded by 4 x plastic barricades - these all bear the Ringway logo (I believe these are the Council's contractors).A single spade has been abandoned within the barricades. This is causing considerable obstruction to pedestrians. This obstruction has remained for more than 2 weeks, and there is no evidence of any work being undertaken. Please remove barricades, or get on and complete whatever work is deemed necessary.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-8, Stow Court, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Obstruction by unpermitted skip, scaffolding, building material on pavement

item.title: Verge not cut, 1st May
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Innsworth Lane, Innsworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Extremely dangerous junction, 1st May
item.description:
Exiting Elbridge Court onto the large roundabout is exceedingly dangerous if trying to access the A40 to Cheltenham. Traffic light timings allow traffic to build uo on the roundabout and make it nearly impossible to safely get in the correct lane for the A40 east. This is made worse by drivers on the roundabout treating it like a racetrack.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchdown, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues
